name: Melting Point (RZazzle)
description:
Submitted to GMTK 2020 Game Jam

A first-person shooter made for GMTK Jam for the theme 'Out of Control'. Use your fire extinguisher to fly around and put out the fires that are damaging the reactor! Watch out though as the reactor heats up, more fires will appear so be sure to cool down the cores to stop the fires spreading! Our first game jam, looking to improve for future jams!

Controls

WASD to Move

Left Click to Fire your Extinguisher

P to Pause

Resources

- Made in Unreal Engine 4

- Features Royalty Free Music from Kevin Macleod

- Programming is by Me and AquATMi - Art is by Dagasawr

- The Hazmat Player Model was bought from the Synty Store
